CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 28, 1955, pg. 19 reads: "Flamingo Hotel Celebrating 9th Anniversary...Anniversary Attraction - The Sarah McLawler Trio, top recording artists, now appearing at the Flamingo Hotel, 2405 Wylie Avenue, are the featured attraction at the ninth anniversary celebration of the hotel which begins Thursday, May 26, and continues for nine days. Left to right: Thomas Hunter, drums; Sarah McLawler, organist, and Richard Otto, electric violin. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Sarah McLawler Trio, left to right: Thomas Hunter, drums; Sarah McLawler, organist; and Richard Otto, electric violin
